import React, { useContext } from 'react'; // Added `useContext` import './ProductDisplay.css'; import star_icon from "../Assets/star_icon.png"; import star_dull_icon from "../Assets/star_dull_icon.png"; import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext'; const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const { product } = props; const { addToCart } = useContext(ShopContext); return (
{/* Display multiple product images */}

{product.name}

{/* Star ratings */}

(122)

Ksh {product.old_price}
Ksh {product.new_price}
A Lightweight, usually knitted, close-fitting garment

Select Size

S
M
L
XL
XXL

Category: Women, T-Shirt, Crop Top

Tags: Modern, Latest

); }; export default ProductDisplay;
